title: Clinical Practicum I (PAED)
description:
The module aims for students to implement advanced practice skills in patient/family assessment, develop and implement a management plan and evaluate the plan’s effectiveness. Care of paediatric patients with approaches to symptoms (SNB developmental milestone for paediatric APN internship) within 3 care settings:
- General paediatric medical and/or surgical wards on acute management
- Emergency care on triaging/early assessment
- Critical care on interventions, resuscitation and stabilization of the critically ill patients. 
Aspects of health promotion and maintenance appropriate to these patients and families will also be emphasized.
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
